laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline results: Patient 1: 48 nmol/liter; Patient 2: 44 nmol/liter. After treatment: Patient 1: 23 nmol/liter; Patient 2: 28 nmol/liter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Serum levels of 25-hydroxyvitamin D remained low at baseline but increased upon treatment, indicating an improvement in both patients.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline results: Patient 1: 46 pmol/liter; Patient 2: 28 pmol/liter. After treatment: Patient 1: 5.7 pmol/liter; Patient 2: 16.7 pmol/liter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: PTH levels decreased after treatment in both patients, indicating a reduction in secondary hyperparathyroidism.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline results: Patient 1: 1.4 mmol/liter (low); Patient 2: 1.6 mmol/liter (within normal range). After treatment: Patient 1: 2.3 mmol/liter; Patient 2: 1.8 mmol/liter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Calcium levels increased in Patient 1 after treatment but fluctuated in Patient 2.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline results: Patient 1: 1.4 mmol/liter; Patient 2: 1.61 mmol/liter. After treatment: Patient 1: 1.58 mmol/liter; Patient 2: 1.6 mmol/liter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Phosphate levels were stable with slight variation after treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline results: Patient 1: 445 U/liter; Patient 2: 1145 U/liter. After treatment: Patient 1: 288 U/liter; Patient 2: 293 U/liter.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Alkaline phosphatase levels decreased after treatment in both patients.
